data.title: Stephen Gannon - Vice President & General Manager Auto Division at TrueCommerce
data.meta_description: Stephen Gannon, MBA has a diverse work experience spanning various leadership roles in the automotive and technology industries.
data.text:
Stephen Gannon, MBA has a diverse work experience spanning various leadership roles in the automotive and technology industries. Stephen is currently the Vice President & General Manager of the Auto Division at TrueCommerce, where they focus on providing supply chain connectivity and integration solutions for automotive manufacturers. Prior to that, they served as the Senior Vice President of Products at Novobi, an ERP consulting and implementation firm specializing in Industry 4.0 transformation.

Stephen Gannon also has experience serving on the board of directors for Open Dealer Exchange, LLC and AVRS, Inc. In addition, they have held key positions at companies such as CDK Global, Epicor Software, Verifone, Oracle, and 360Commerce. Throughout their career, they have demonstrated expertise in product management, strategy development, and business leadership.

Overall, Stephen Gannon's work experience showcases their strong background in the automotive and technology industries, as well as their ability to drive business growth and deliver innovative solutions to clients.

Stephen Gannon, MBA, graduated with a Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) degree in Marketing & Management from St. Edward's University in 2004. Stephen then pursued further education and obtained a Master's in Business Administration (MBA) with a focus on Business Administration and Management, General from St. Edward's University in 2004. In addition to their formal education, Stephen has also earned certifications in "Telling Stories with Data," "Apple Watch Tips and Tricks," and "Strategic Thinking" from LinkedIn in 2020.
